text: Hello there! I'm Eve, your personal assistant!
I'm here to help you <study phys-ERR> use reflection and refraction to manipulate light beams!
Let's get started, shall we?

Let's see here... Ah, yes. Ok so you'll first want to make an [[assembly_table]]. This simple block will help you craft everything you need. I will guide you through the steps of its usage when we get to that.
For now, craft one. It requires 7 iron ingots and 1 [[lens]] block.

Next, you'll want to craft a [[magnifier]] block. When provided with a 3x3 of lense blocks above it - provided that they have a line of sight to the sky - it will converge the sunlight into a focused beam of light directly below it.

I should note that you should place the magnifier (with the lense blocks above it) anywhere above the assembly table. This will be a one time setup to get you the basic items and can be altered after we're done with the second step.
